main event: A police officer in Socorro, New Mexico reported seeing a strange, egg-shaped object land and then take off rapidly in 1964.
interesting points: The object was about 12-15 feet long and 15 feet wide, with a shiny metallic surface.
The officer heard a roar and saw flames as the object took off, leaving scorched ground and impressions where it had landed.
Two small human-like figures were reported near the object.
Other similar sightings were reported in the area around the same time.
The Air Force investigated the incident but could not identify the object.
